QueryResult.text: SELECT v.user_id user_key, CASE v.object_id WHEN 663 THEN 'project' WHEN 50663 THEN 'application' WHEN 50660 THEN 'asset' WHEN 51780 THEN 'idea' WHEN 50669 THEN 'other' WHEN 50666 THEN 'product' WHEN 51101 THEN 'service' ELSE o.object_code END investment_type_key, v.object_instance_id investment_key, v.permission_code permission_key FROM DHW_INV_SEC_EXTRACT_V0 v INNER JOIN dwh_cfg_object_type o ON v.object_id = o.object_key
